name: Rainbow Bride
description:
In Malay, Pengantin Perempuan Pelangi.
The bride is wearing a traditional Malay bridal 'tudung' or headscarf with colourful elements of flowers and crystals. On top of her head is a blue crystal tiara to make her feel like royalty.
Despite her eccentric make-up on her pink lavender face, yellow is the primary colour that represents brightness, happiness, beauty, warm, wisdom and hope. No matter what the shade is, the alluring bride catches your attention.
The background has two colours to signify the couple's sides in the wedding ceremony: red (bride) and blue (groom). The red side dominates the painting more to accentuate the beautiful bride.
